Best game ever made.

"BioShock Infinite" - одна из редчайшего вида игр, которая запоминается и буквально врезается в вашу память в качестве необычайно захватывающего, прекраснейшего, динамичного и сюжетно выносящего мозг зрелища. Игра, которая буквально заставила засесть за нее и пройти до самого конца. Финал игры разрывает все мыслимые и немыслимые шаблоны; я до сих пор под огромным впечатлением от игры.

Мои 10 из 10. Рекомендую всем, кто любит умные и осмысленные игры. "BioShock Infinite" - это далеко не просто шутер от первого лица. Это настоящий шедевр, коих мало в нашем мире.
Interessante Story sehr gut erzählt. Dadurch leider auch etwas linearer als die Vorgänger. Dennoch fesselnd bis zum Ende.
This is just must have, one of the best games I ever played....
This game is amazing! The game is beautiful. the story is really deep. I totally recommend this game! :D

Одна из лучших игр в серии. Динамичный шутер, прекрасная история, потрясающий, хотя, немного банальный, конец. И все это в одной игре. Обязательно возьмите Season Pass, пока со скидкой идет. Эта игра стоит своих денег.
советую поиграть сюжет захватывающий!!!

While this game looks stunning and the story is pretty good, the gameplay lets it down.Having played the first two i expected the combat to be improved, but it just got dumbed down.This game is story first with some shooting thrown in.When you first start playing you will be blown away by great visual scenes.You get to walk through some really cool looking areas, which help set the scene of the story.But other than that has little to offer. 
Combat is mostly arena style areas which only becomes challenging after you've completed the game and unlocked 1999 mode.So as far as the FPS side if it goes, its very boring and felt like an after thought.
Being pretty short without any replayability, its definately not worth the full price, but if you can pick it up on sale its worth it.But really you're better off getting the first two.Game of the Year? i think not.So i would recommend only if its cheap

Digame, Señor DeWitt ¿Que opina de su visita a Columbia?

_ Columbia no es mas que un lugar salido de la mente enferma de un fanatico, un lugar de pesadilla que te ofrece toda la belleza del Eden, toda su dulzura y su color. Para luego arrebatartelo todo, arrastrarte hasta el mismisimo infierno y abandonarte en la mas horrenda de las pesadillas. Llena de mostruos, miedos y dolor. Viajar por Columbia y sus secretos, es como descender junto a dante a sus infiernos y experimentar el peor de los sentimientos humanos. La soledad.

¿Volveria? Señor DeWitt.

_ Claro, una e infinitas veces. Pues en el ojo de ese demoniaco lugar, hay un pequeño faro que alumbra tu camino, por el cual volveria una y mil veces. Elisabeth.

¿Me podria contar su historia entera? Señor DeWitt.

_ Claro, pero acepte un consejo. Visitelo, es mucho mejor que solo oir lo que alli ocurre. No se arrepentira
BEST GAME EVER

This game just had me wanting more! It was amazing every second from the story, the enviroment, the cutscenes and I'm not a fan of cutscenes even though they tell a lot and makes you understand things but damn this is one of the weirdest, best and enjoyable games i have played.

Bioshock: Infinite è una perla rara, un MUST HAVE, senza ombra di dubbio. Levine ce l’ha fatta! Ha creato qualcosa di unico e prezioso che pochi se ne sono visti e giocati. La storia di DeWitt, Elizabeth, Comstock e Columbia è qualcosa di assolutamente sublime e che è un piacere da dipanare e scoprire, colpo di scena su colpo di scena, dialogo su dialogo fino a giungere al climax sul finale. Un capolavoro in ogni senso, con un comparto artistico impressionante e una qualità sonora davvero eccelsa e (forse) senza eguali; ottimo lavoro anche per quanto riguarda il doppiaggio in italiano che è uno dei più validi di questa generazione (se non di sempre). Elizabeth e DeWitt sono pura dinamite, una delle coppie più carismatiche mai apparse in un videogames, vi affezionerete immediatamente ai personaggi, alle loro battute sarcastiche e alle loro vicende, immergendovi completamente in una delle storie più contorte, coinvolgenti e profonde che la storia ricordi (inoltre vi suggeriamo di non perderne nemmeno il più insignificante dei frammenti, poiché altrimenti tirare le fila sarà cosa ardua). Vi innamorerete sicuramente di Columbia e di tutto ciò che Bioshock: Infinite saprà offrirvi nel bene e nel male.

Per saperne di più: http://www.z-giochi.com/recensioni/recensione-bioshock-infinite-72558

Amazing art direction of American patriotism & culture - well written story and character development. You get a real sense of reward snooping around each corner for more story and a better understand of the Bioshock universe. Gameplay feels fluent as soon as you pick it up. I picked this game up on sale for 9.99USD during a steam sale, this game is definity worth the full price though. Skylines feel great riding at high speeds and knocking enemies to the ground. Elizabeth tossing you a weapon when you desperately need ammo. Work your way through the Biohock universe with weapon and power upgrades.
Очень рекомендую!

Probably my favorite game of 2013. I mean I didn't play many games but damn...I really liked this one.

Seriously, this game will take your brain places it's never been before, is, or will ever be. The combat does seem like a means to an end to just tell this incredible story, but the combat doesn't drag it down too much.

I found this game riveting and beautiful right out of the gate. The elements of great mystery and foreshadowing abound, and the story is tangled and well-woven.  Even I, who pride myself on solving mysteries and game plots quickly, was blown away at the finish(no spoilers).  The old familiar Unreal engine plus engaging new weapons and powers made for a great combat and defensive experience.  Over all one of my favorite games purchased in the recent sale, if not the favorite.
wow

Even though they spice things up with many new mechanics, the gameplay can feel a bit same-y after a while. That being said, those who haven't played the story to its completion are really missing out on an outstanding piece of modern storytelling!

Have I written a review for this game before? Was I going to? Anything is possible, perhaps in this universe, you haven't played this game yet.

What are you waiting for? Heads, or tails?

This is the 2nd time I've played the Bishock Infinite game, first time was on PS3 and now on PC. They were the same graphics on both PS3 and PC. The story line in this bioshock game really impacted me, it was very much entertaining than the previous Bioshock games. It has although lost some of the touch I found interesting in the previous game; from a more dark and mysterious atmosphere to a more sunny and birght one, honestly I prefered the previous atmospheres. The game may be linear but unlike other games that are like that, this one keeps you entertained for a much longer period, with not many repetitive missions and objectives though some objectives in the game can be frustrating and tedious. One of the things that really impacted me from this Bioshock game was the similar yet different gameplay from other Bioshock games. Now you use vigors, you have a metal grappling hook, and you have the beautiful and intellegent Elizabeth (who's player model was somewhat drawn badly into the game, not really noticeable unless you try to see it) who helps you in battle when you need it and gets you into secret places with lockpicks. 

One downside that I see in the game was how it could've been even greater than it was, many things could have been added in-game such as more choices to choose from that would've affect the ending, afterall, this game is about choices and decisions made in life.

9.5/10

If you are looking for a game as in-depth story-wise as it is action-packed, Bioshock Infinite offers both in an astounding way. Much like its predecessors (Bioshock and Bioshock 2), the game offers players a diverse arsenal to take down foes and features mind-boggling technology and scientific advancement physics nerds-like myself-apreciate greatly. However, unlike the opression of underwater Rapture, Columbia is a city in the sky which offers a completely different setting and dynamic. The story is filled with shocking twists, internal struggle, and a profoundly satisfying ending. So much better than the bare violence of military games.

Als Shooter eher mittelmäßig. Dafür ist die Story am Ende für einen Shooter schon eine kleine Sensation, kommt aber anfangs eher langsam in Fahrt. Optisch überdurchschnittlich, Musik passend und Synchronisation sehr gut.

Der Hit ist hier aber ganz klar die Atmosphäre, hier stimmt fast alles.

Fazit: Bei dem heutigen Schrott der angeblichen AAAAAAAA-Titel muss man dieses hier wirklich gespielt haben und bitte bis zum Ende durchhalten! Die ersten beiden Teile werden für das Verständnis nicht benötigt.
